title: problem
body:
i just  erased  league  of legends  because  i had a problem  and  now i cant  download  it  ..it says something  about error 
i have  windows 10  and  i didnt  have  problem when   i was  downloaded it  at  first 
what can i do??

replies.body: Can you expand on the error you get or [post a screenshot link](https://gyazo.com/) here?
